EmailTemplate.name: iMeet International Locations
EmailTemplate.subject: IMeet International Locations...
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Just wanted to follow up with you to let you know the countries that are included in your iMeet minutes:
Belgium Canada France Germany Hungary Ireland Israel Italy Portugal Singapore Spain and the UK
So anytime iMeet calls you or one of your guests within the US or within these countries there is no charge (up to 10,000 minutes). Dial out isn't just convenient - It is great feature for savings!
If you go over 10,000 minutes per month you are charged per minute...and if you call other countries you will be charged per minute as well. The costs are on your agreement - or let me know which countries and I will get them for you.
Best wishes,
Susan A. Porter
Account Executive
408-645-9722
imeet.com/pgi/susanporter
